DataElement.preferredName: Person Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not applicable coded response that asks if the patient has undergone a clinical treatment in which hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._A clinical treatment in which hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Property.preferredName: Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A clinical treatment in which hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A clinical treatment in which hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient undergone an allo
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient undergone an allogeneic stem cell transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had a prior allogeneic transplantation? (such individuals have increased risk of complications from nivolumab)

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have NO previous history of HCT or other cellular therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received autologous stem cell transplant (ASCT) less than or equal to 12 weeks prior to the first dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a previous history of HCT or other cellular therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has had an allogeneic stem cell transplant.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a prior allogeneic SCT or is planning to receive allogeneic SCT in the future?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN Patient has had prior allogeneic stem cell or solid organ transplant
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has had prior allogeneic stem cell or solid organ transplant

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received a prior allogeneic SCT or is planning to receive allogeneic SCT in the near future?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior allogeneic HCT within one year of study enrollment?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.4.4 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002268. ak
